activities: Hard Rock Cafe International (USA), Inc. (“Hard Rock”) receives customer information from the European Union (“Personal Information”) both through our website (www.hardrock.com) and from our affiliates that operate restaurants in the EU.  Personal Information is used only for the legitimate business interests or obligations of Hard Rock, including but not limited to: 1) facilitating transactions and executing the services requested by the customer; 2) communicating with customers about orders, products, services, promotional offers and our loyalty program; 3) updating our records and generally maintaining customer accounts; 4) managing a customer's membership in Hard Rock's loyalty program and, 5) handling consumer inquiries and questions.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President of Business Affairs
